summary: Researchers have developed an augmented reality app that enhances home viewing experiences by overlaying real-time statistics and player tracking during basketball games.
A viral social media campaign initiated by a group of celebrities aims to raise awareness about mental health, encouraging users to share personal stories using the hashtag #MindMatters.
A retired rugby player is returning to the field after a five-year absence, driven by a new passion for the game and a desire to inspire younger teammates.
A popular television show paid tribute to a late cast member by dedicating a special episode to their memorable performances and behind-the-scenes anecdotes.
The national curling association has introduced a mentorship program, appointing retired champions to guide up-and-coming coaches in developing competitive teams.
A well-known reality TV star has sparked controversy by endorsing a beauty brand accused of unethical practices.
